refnamediv.refpurpose: gets BPEL variable data within <bpelv:exec binding="SQL"> activity

refsect2.title: var_name
refsect2.para: varchar the name of BPEL variable

refsect2.title: part
refsect2.para: varchar default null the part of BPEL variable in question.

refsect2.title: query
refsect2.para: varchar default null XPATH query for selecting data in the BPEL variable

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: this function returns the selected data from the BPEL variable. This can be either an XML tree or a varchar or an integer.

para.para: Returns select by query expression data from part (if applicable) of the BPEL variable. If the variable is unknown, or if the XPATH expression signals an error, the appropriate error is signalled.
This procedure may only be used in Virtuoso/PL code invoked from a BPEL process.
